keywhiz.auth.cookie

Class AuthenticatedEncryptedCookieFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • keywhiz.auth.cookie.AuthenticatedEncryptedCookieFactory

  • public class AuthenticatedEncryptedCookieFactory
extends Object
    Produces tokens and cookies based on encrypted UserCookieData records.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuthenticatedEncryptedCookieFactory

        @Inject
public AuthenticatedEncryptedCookieFactory(Clock clock,
                                                   com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper,
                                                   GCMEncryptor encryptor,
                                                   CookieConfig config)
        Parameters:
        clock - to use for resolving current time
        mapper - json serializer
        encryptor - performs authenticated-encryption using a non-colliding counter specific to a host.
        config - parameters for cookie generation

    • Method Detail

      • getSession

        public String getSession(User user,
                         ZonedDateTime expiration)
        Produces an authenticating token.
        Parameters:
        user - identity the token will authenticate.
        expiration - timestamp when token should expire.
        Returns:
        token which can be used to authenticate as user until expiration.

      • cookieFor

        public javax.ws.rs.core.NewCookie cookieFor(String value,
                                            ZonedDateTime expiration)
        Produces a cookie string for a given value and expiration.
        Parameters:
        value - value of new cookie.
        expiration - expiration time of cookie.
        Returns:
        serialized cookie with given value and expiration.

      • getSessionCookie

        public javax.ws.rs.core.NewCookie getSessionCookie(User user,
                                                   ZonedDateTime expiration)
        Shortcut method to produce an authenticated cookie string.
        Parameters:
        user - identity the token will authenticate.
        expiration - timestamp when cookie should expire.
        Returns:
        serialized cookie which can be used to authenticate as user until expiration.

      • getExpiredSessionCookie

        public javax.ws.rs.core.NewCookie getExpiredSessionCookie()
        Produces an expired cookie string, used to update/overwrite an existing cookie.
        Returns:
        serialized expired cookie with matching parameters to authenticating cookie.
